name: @atmtfy/elite
description: Elite Shopify 2.0 Theme. Based on Shopify's "Dawn", but with preprocessing, etc
author: Automatify

scripts.start: npm run build && run-p watch serve
scripts.deploy: npm run webpack -env=production && cd dist && shopify theme push
scripts.theme-check: npm run webpack --env=development && shopify theme check
scripts.pull: cd dist && rm .shopifyignore && touch .shopifyignore && shopify theme pull
scripts.push: npm run webpack --env=production && cd dist && shopify theme push --unpublished --nodelete
scripts.update: npm run webpack --env=production && cd dist && shopify theme push --nodelete
scripts.publish: npm run webpack --env=production && cd dist && shopify theme push --publish --nodelete
scripts.ignore:restore: cd ../src || cd ./src || true && rm -f .shopifyignore || true && mv ./src/.shopifyignore.backup ./src/.shopifyignore || true
scripts.ignore:default: cd ../src || cd ./src || true && rm -f .shopifyignore || true && mv ./src/.shopifyignore.default ./src/.shopifyignore
